div.p: PLEASE NOTE THAT INDIVIDUALS WITH CHRONIC/ PRE EXISTING CONDITIONS WILL BE INDIVIDUALY UNDERWRITTEN. MEDICATIONS FOR SUCH CONDITIONS MAY ATTRACT ADDITIONAL FEES.
